chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: In today's video, we will learn about Core Web Vitals and why Core Web Vitals are necessary.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Like this video and keep high energy.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: The thing is that your website should be in your iPhone, iPad, Android, Surface Pro 4 devices.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Because we have to give good experience to all users through our website.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: In this video, we will also learn about Chrome's hidden tool which is called Lighthouse.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: How can you use it to enhance your website.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: In the comment section, write down Sigma Batch OP.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Let's go to the computer screen and let's roll the intro.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So guys, I have come to my computer screen.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And I will make a new folder which is called Video 6.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Video 6.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And in Video 6, I will click on VS Code as always.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And today, I am going to tell you about SEO.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: First of all, I want to tell you what SEO is.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: SEO stands for Search Engine Optimization.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: You can see any website and it has SEO.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Let's take an example of Amazon.in.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I opened Amazon.in and I wanted to download this website as soon as possible.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So that they can get their products in the search.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Google is a search engine.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Google's responsibility is to show good pages to users.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So Google will only show those pages which will be fast.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: They present good information and along with that,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: there are some things which are good for users.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: For example, there are two pages from the editor.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: One page has told about Dogfood.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: The other page has also told about Dogfood.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: But among these two, page 2 is very fast and loads well.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So Google will give more preference to it.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Along with that, there are core web vitals which Google considers to rank two pages.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: First of all, there is content.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Content is the most important.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: If your content is good on the page,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: then you can rank your website without the core web vitals.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: But if you are competing with a page with the same content,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: which has presented almost similar quality content,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: then your core web vitals will be seen.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And if your core web vitals are good,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: then you will be given preference.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So the first thing that comes in core web vitals is your CLS.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: You watch this video here which I have run on the web.dev website.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: You will see that someone comes to your website and he is in order to cancel it.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: The mistake he has made,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: the above thing became visible.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And he shifted the layout.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And the order was completed.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: But the user wanted the order to be completed.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: If it was not, he wanted to click on it.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: In this way, the user experience is very bad.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And as you saw in this video, it shouldn't be like this.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: That's why our CLS should be at least.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Now what is the definition of CLS?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Cumulative layout shift means,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: how much the page is shifting while loading.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Suppose you have loaded the page and you get to see this first.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: This was above and after that, when this load part was shifted,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: the layout should not shift.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: If you put vit and ride in images, the layout should not shift.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: The next metric we are going to talk about is LCP.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And LCP stands for largest contextual paint.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: This means that if the user is viewing a page,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: then the biggest element is on it.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: For example, the biggest part of this image is loading in how long?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: The entire page will be loaded.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: But the biggest element which is most important is loading in how long?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: The meaning of web.dev and Google is a good LCP score.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: It should be 2.5 seconds.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: That is, the biggest element should be loaded in 2.5 seconds.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: After this comes the third metric, FID, which stands for first input delay.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: First input delay means that if any user clicks on an input element,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: like on the button or any type of input given on a page,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: then how long does that input process take?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: For example, if you click on a button,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: then the button click browser processes in how long?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And the meaning of Google and web.dev should start processing

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: at least 100 milliseconds.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So these were the three core web vitals which are very important.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I will tell you for your information that these core web vitals are updated too.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: But these three are very important and you should know.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Now I will show you what the Lighthouse report is and why it is generated.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And how will these three core web vitals value be?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So I will tell you here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: If you will inspect it right click,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: and if you can see it on the right side,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: then you can click here and drag it down.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: You can drag it down again and drag it down.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I prefer to drag it down because it is my habit to see it from the beginning.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Now here you can see the option of Lighthouse.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Lighthouse basically generates a report and tells you what can be improved in your HTML page.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: For example, if I want to see in mobile that how mobile users see my website,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: then I will click on mobile or I will click on desktop,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I will close this tab, I will click on mobile and here I will click on analyze page load,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: then this report will generate for me for Lighthouse.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: You can see here that a report has been generated.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Performance, accessibility, best practices, SEO and PWA are all shown here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Now you can see here that some things are showing in red,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: that is the scope of improvement in the page.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Now here you can see that you can properly size your images.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: 2.7 seconds fast your website can be loaded.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So all these suggestions are given to you by Lighthouse.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And if you incorporate these suggestions,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: then your website will be loaded very well and the user will have a good experience.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Now you can see here that image elements do not have explicit width and height.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So you should give width and height, the width and height attribute of image,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: which we had read in the last video, should be used so that it is reserved in your browser.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: When we set width and height in HTML, then space in the browser is reserved.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Otherwise, if we do not set height and width,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: then what will happen that the browser will not tell us how much space we have to reserve.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And the longer the CSS load, the lower the page will shift.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So we do not want our page to shift during loading time.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: If our page starts shifting, then if we click here,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: then when it shifts from the wrong side, then it can be done.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Click here and sit.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Suppose there was an image here, I am going to click here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And the time I clicked here, this image was loaded and all these buttons were shifted below.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And instead of clicking here by mistake, I will click on the image.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: This is called cumulative layout shift.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So this kind of shift is not preferred at all.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Google does not prefer it at all.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And this should be at least.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: You can see that the space is quite low, cumulative layout shift.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So we have to keep the cumulative layout shift at least.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So that our user can get a very good experience.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So here we get a lot more suggestions.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And this is for our mobile.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Now we can generate desktop reports.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And the desktop report will be generated.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So as you can see, it has generated a report.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: 92 marks in performance.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: There are 82 marks in accessibility.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: 75 in best practices.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: 75 in SEO.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Now here you can see that all the good things are told here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And all the scope of improvements that Lighthouse tells you.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So this is a hidden tool that we should use.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Now I want to tell you about the meta tags and meta description.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So what I will do here is that I will make a new file.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I will name it index.html.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And after making one HTML file, the first SEO element that I want to tell you is title.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Your title reflects your page content.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So this is a very good SEO practice.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Whenever your page hinge is happening, you make the title like this.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: That it reflects your page content.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Because if you want your website on Google,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: then that title will come according to you.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: From the Google index, you can write code with Harry.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And you write like this.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So this is the title of the page.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And this is the title of the page.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Which is put by YouTube.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: This is the title of the page which is put by Instagram.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: This is the title of the page which is put by GitHub.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So if you put the title on the page and the title reflects your page content truly,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: then your website will rank very well.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Now here I will put the content.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And I will put an H1 and write Harry here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And after that I will write a paragraph here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And here I will write Lorem45.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Now why did I write Lorem45?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I will write the view word.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Why did I write 45?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: This is a very good question.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I wrote 45 because I have 4 or 5 around Alcio.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So I have given 4 or 5.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I write 23 too because they are also around.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So there is no other reason.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Now I will quickly preview it here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I will open it here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So look at this.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: This is how it looks.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Now this is written as a document.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: If I leave it like this, then this is a good SEO practice.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: I will write about Harry here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And I will write code with Harry here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Which is my website.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And what will happen if I do this?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: That my title will be reflected here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Like you can see.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So what will happen if I do this?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: That my website will increase in the chances of seeing it in Google.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: After inspecting it, I will also take out its light of report.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And I will see what is the scope of improvement.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Right now its light of report will be very good.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Because there is no such thing that I should improve.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: But when I put images, I will get suggestions.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Like put width and height.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Along with that, I will tell you one more trick.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So that you can know how your website looks in any mobile.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So you people click here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Can you see here the computer?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Click on it.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: And if you choose responsive in it.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: Then you can see how your website will look in any kind of device.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: So your website is responsive or not.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: You can see it here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial
chunks.text: If you are looking at a specific device.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML  Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial

text: In today's video, we will learn about Core Web Vitals and why Core Web Vitals are necessary. Like this video and keep high energy. The thing is that your website should be in your iPhone, iPad, Android, Surface Pro 4 devices. Because we have to give good experience to all users through our website. In this video, we will also learn about Chrome's hidden tool which is called Lighthouse. How can you use it to enhance your website. In the comment section, write down Sigma Batch OP. Let's go to the computer screen and let's roll the intro. So guys, I have come to my computer screen. And I will make a new folder which is called Video 6. Video 6. And in Video 6, I will click on VS Code as always. And today, I am going to tell you about SEO. First of all, I want to tell you what SEO is. SEO stands for Search Engine Optimization. You can see any website and it has SEO. Let's take an example of Amazon.in. I opened Amazon.in and I wanted to download this website as soon as possible. So that they can get their products in the search. Google is a search engine. Google's responsibility is to show good pages to users. So Google will only show those pages which will be fast. They present good information and along with that, there are some things which are good for users. For example, there are two pages from the editor. One page has told about Dogfood. The other page has also told about Dogfood. But among these two, page 2 is very fast and loads well. So Google will give more preference to it. Along with that, there are core web vitals which Google considers to rank two pages. First of all, there is content. Content is the most important. If your content is good on the page, then you can rank your website without the core web vitals. But if you are competing with a page with the same content, which has presented almost similar quality content, then your core web vitals will be seen. And if your core web vitals are good, then you will be given preference. So the first thing that comes in core web vitals is your CLS. You watch this video here which I have run on the web.dev website. You will see that someone comes to your website and he is in order to cancel it. The mistake he has made, the above thing became visible. And he shifted the layout. And the order was completed. But the user wanted the order to be completed. If it was not, he wanted to click on it. In this way, the user experience is very bad. And as you saw in this video, it shouldn't be like this. That's why our CLS should be at least. Now what is the definition of CLS? Cumulative layout shift means, how much the page is shifting while loading. Suppose you have loaded the page and you get to see this first. This was above and after that, when this load part was shifted, the layout should not shift. If you put vit and ride in images, the layout should not shift. The next metric we are going to talk about is LCP. And LCP stands for largest contextual paint. This means that if the user is viewing a page, then the biggest element is on it. For example, the biggest part of this image is loading in how long? The entire page will be loaded. But the biggest element which is most important is loading in how long? The meaning of web.dev and Google is a good LCP score. It should be 2.5 seconds. That is, the biggest element should be loaded in 2.5 seconds. After this comes the third metric, FID, which stands for first input delay. First input delay means that if any user clicks on an input element, like on the button or any type of input given on a page, then how long does that input process take? For example, if you click on a button, then the button click browser processes in how long? And the meaning of Google and web.dev should start processing at least 100 milliseconds. So these were the three core web vitals which are very important. I will tell you for your information that these core web vitals are updated too. But these three are very important and you should know. Now I will show you what the Lighthouse report is and why it is generated. And how will these three core web vitals value be?
